channel.title: Does anyone know how to fix this?
channel.description:
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/e7ysk1.png[/img]
So basically, i don't know why my client is running :| The 1.7.0_04 is my right java version so yea, if any of you guys know what it stays like that " Checking for updates -1% " PLEASE HELP! The server is 677/711 (667 loading 711) thanks. Also, my Source is running perfectly so that's something all good :P And yes, i did change the 127.0.0.1 if you're wondering.

item.title: Does anyone know how to fix this?
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

[quote=“308507631, post:3, topic:441564”]Oh, well yea i did i changed both to the ip and alright i’ll try optimus.
Thanks a lot man.
And do you have a source and client that’s 600+ of your own?[/quote]

Anytime man, PM me whenever you need anything.

And I do not have “my own” 600+ server. I use the OptimusScape source which is based off of Disturbed, which is based off of Matrix.

Best thing to do is start from a lower revision, I wrote my own 317 Hyperion from scratch, but nothing higher really. I’m not a pro with Java, but I know my way around it.

Anyways, yeah; download OptimusScape, if you need any help or fixes, just ask. Although I’ll give them to you in an ‘educational’ way wich will advance you in Java step by step.

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Does anyone know how to fix this?
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

In the client, make sure the IP is changed both in Loader.java and Client.java to 127.0.0.1
Then run the server, and load up the client.

And I don’t recommend using ViacomX. It’s just a leech; find Disturbed or OptimusScape.

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone know how to fix this?
